description: This file is the main entry point of a React Native mobile app, configuring navigation with bottom tabs, theme customization, and rendering primary screens such as Menu, Orders, and Restaurant Info.

classes.name: NavigationContainer
classes.description: A React Navigation component that manages the navigation tree and contains the navigation state.

classes.name: DefaultTheme
classes.description: Default theme configuration provided by React Navigation for theming the navigator components.

classes.name: Theme
classes.description: Type defining the theme object used to customize navigation UI colors.

classes.name: Tab
classes.description: Instance of createBottomTabNavigator used to configure bottom tab navigation.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main functional component that sets up the app layout with navigation, theme, and screen components.
